sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const OtherInterests = () => (

Other Interests

STEM Advocacy & Education

I am deeply committed to making STEM education accessible and inspiring for young people across Africa. Through initiatives like Nigeria Flying Labs and Aero-flight Tech Initiative , I offer pro-bono and paid STEM training in underserved communities and premium secondary schools. These programs focus on robotics, drones, and artificial intelligence, helping students develop hands-on skills and explore future careers in tech.

Music

Outside of engineering and data science, music is a big part of my life. I enjoy playing the guitar and piano— both as a form of creative expression and personal relaxation. Whether improvising jazz chords or composing something original, I believe music and engineering share a beautiful symmetry rooted in rhythm, structure, and creativity.

Chess

I’m an avid chess enthusiast. The game sharpens strategic thinking, foresight, and decision-making—skills that are essential in both tech leadership and research. I occasionally participate in local tournaments and online matches, and enjoy using chess as a tool to teach problem-solving to students.

); export default OtherInterests;
